item.title: Per Replica States: Improving SolrCloud stability & reliability
item.description: Solr nodes should be like cattle, not pets! Every week, somewhere in the world, at least one DevOps engineer responsible for a non-trivially sized Solr cluster thinks like this when they deal with SolrCloud operations such as cluster restarts.
